original_text: The Jews therefore, because it was the preparation, that the bodies should not remain upon the cross on the sabbath day, (for that sabbath day was an high day,) besought Pilate that their legs might be broken, and that they might be taken away.
korean_text: 이 날은 준비일이라 유대인들은 그 안식일이 큰 날이므로 그 안식일에 시체들을 십자가에 두지 아니하려 하여 빌라도에게 그들의 다리를 꺾어 시체를 치워 달라 하니

sentences.original_text: The Jews therefore, because it was the preparation,
that the bodies should not remain upon the cross
sentences.korean_translation: 그 시체들이 십자가에 남아있지 않게 하려고,

sentences.original_text: (for that sabbath day was an high day,)
that their legs might be broken,
and that they might be taken away.
